semantics.label: Construction
semantics.description: JavaScript or JessieCode code for the construction

fields.label: Board Id
fields.description: Id of the JSXGraph container. If empty (which is the default) use the constant BOARDID in the JavaScript code.

fields.label: Breedte
fields.description: Width of JSXGraph container, use any CSS unit.

fields.label: Hoogte
fields.description: Height of JSXGraph container, use any CSS unit.
